channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: George Santos in court for sentencing on Long Island
item.description: George Santos faces sentencing today on Long Island after pleading guilty to federal wire fraud and identity theft.

item.title: Car bomb kills senior Russian general in Moscow: Officials
item.description: A car bomb in Moscow has killed a senior Russian military officer, Russian officials said.

item.title: Forecasters warn of fire risk amid low humidity, wind gusts as Pine Barrens fire burns

item.description: It was connected to the internet on an unsecured commercial line, sources said.

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: Trump claims '200' deals so far
item.description: Trump pushed back on China after Beijing's foreign ministry called the administration's assertions that tariff talks are happening "fake news."

item.description: President Trump told Time magazine trade negotiations would be "finished" in 3-4 weeks.

item.title: "Bone collector" caterpillar disguises itself in the remains of its prey
item.description: There are other meat-eating caterpillars that "do lots of crazy things, but this takes the cake," the study's author said.
